turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an iced caramel brulee latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where is the nearest starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is on Horizon and College, about two miles from you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is the exact address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 690 E horizon drive, henderson, nv 89015

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, any special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nothing than how It's already made

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How is it made so I can make sure, what is in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is made with espresso, milk (2%), ice, caramel brulee sauce and finished with whipped cream and caramel brulee topping

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And do you want extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No extra, but I do want whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want extra anything? Extra espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I just want the coffee the way that it's made

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the biggest one they have, the grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the milk type you want is 2% correct, I just want to make sure I have it right

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 2% milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright then, I'll go ahead and order for you the caramel brulee iced latte at horizon and college

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready for pick up in about ten minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you very much for your help
